cardContent.folded: 38-year-old woman with hypertension, obesity, anemia, depression, anxiety, insomnia, relationship distress, chronic stress.
cardContent.expanded: 38-year-old woman with hypertension, obesity, iron deficiency anemia, recurrent depression/anxiety (including suicide attempt), insomnia, allergic rhinitis, and chronic psychosocial stressors; on sertraline, lisinopril, fluticasone, and iron.

cardContent.folded: Persistent low mood, anhedonia, fatigue, insomnia, poor appetite, guilt, strained relationships, financial stress.
cardContent.expanded: Alison has persistent low mood, anhedonia, fatigue, poor sleep and appetite, guilt, and functional impairment. She is making small behavioral changes, supported by her sister, with no current suicidal ideation.

cardContent.folded: Mood unchanged, low energy, poor sleep, guilt, loneliness, financial worries, subtle progress with strategies.
cardContent.expanded: Ongoing depression, low motivation, poor sleep and appetite, guilt about parenting and work, financial stress, relationship difficulties, and worries about lack of improvement.

cardContent.folded: No medication history with current sessions.
cardContent.expanded: No medication history with current sessions.
